ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“You don't remember me!?
I'm {Cloud}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth! What are you thinking!?
What are you doing!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Cloud}
“What!? What are you saying!?
Be more…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“…Jenova.
The arm of Jenova.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Cloud}
“…I'll try, but don't interrupt
me while I'm explaining.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth went off searching for the
Promised Land, so he could become the ruler
of the Planet… That was 5 years ago.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Cloud}
“Then Sephiroth came back
and killed President Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Cloud}
“And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // {Cloud}
“He was carrying Jenova with him.”{PAUSE}“…This much I do know.
He told me he wants to go to the
Promised Land with his mother, Jenova.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // {Cloud}
“…I guess that's about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth…
is alive…”{PAUSE}“The Promised Land…
Does it really exist…?”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Aeris}
“The time is now…
I think that was what was said.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Aeris}
“Maybe we shouldn't stay
in here anymore…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // {Barret}
“Jenova…You mean he's been walkin'
around with that thing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Barret}
“He said the time is now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Barret}
“Whoa!
We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Tifa}
“Jenova…
He's been carrying this thing around?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“He said something about
it being time for something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Tifa}
“We should hide somewhere again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Red XIII}
“That's what disappeared
from the Shinra building…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Red XIII}
“Sephiroth took Jenova…
What does it mean?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Red XIII}
“The time is now?
What does that mean?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Red XIII}
“I don't think it's wise
to stay here any longer.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Yuffie}
“Eeeew! What IS it! GROSS!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Yuffie}
“Gag…
I'm sick enough as it is without
you having to show me THAT!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Yuffie}
“He was mumbling something
about time!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Yuffie}
“Phew…
We're finally here…
Now we gotta hide.”

ops.raw: d0 2d ff 09 fe 01 00 2d ff c0 fd 01 00
d0 c6 fe bc fd 1e 01 df fe 0e fe 1e 01
d0 b5 ff e0 ff 01 00 4c 00 dd ff 01 00

ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “…After a long sleep…”{PAUSE}“…the time…”{PAUSE}“…time has…come…”
fade({r:0, g:255, b:0, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:255, b:0, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:255, b:0, speed:250, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:6, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:36}); // “Dock workers--We will be docking
in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes.
Prepare for docking.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“Sephiroth! What are you thinking!?
What are you doing!?”

{Cloud}
“What!? What are you saying!?
Be more…”

{Red XIII}
“That's what disappeared
from the Shinra building…”

{Barret}
“Jenova…You mean he's been walkin'
around with that thing?”

{Tifa}
“Jenova…
He's been carrying this thing around?”

{Red XIII}
“Sephiroth took Jenova…
What does it mean?”

{Yuffie}
“Gag…
I'm sick enough as it is without
you having to show me THAT!”

{Tifa}
“He said something about
it being time for something.”

{Aeris}
“The time is now…
I think that was what was said.”

{Red XIII}
“The time is now?
What does that mean?”

“Dock workers--We will be docking
in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes.
Prepare for docking.”

{Barret}
“I don't know WHAT the hell's goin' on!”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, why don't you explain to
me what's happened so far?”
{CHOICE}I'll try
{CHOICE}No way

{Aeris}
“Hmm…
I don't get it.”{PAUSE}“Hey, {Cloud}.
Can you explain it to us?”
{CHOICE}I'll try
{CHOICE}Too much trouble

{Tifa}
“I'm getting so confused…”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, explain what's happened
so far.”
{CHOICE}I'll try
{CHOICE}Too much trouble

{Red XIII}
“Hmm…
The story's not that simple.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}, why don't you
summarize what's happened so far?”
{CHOICE}I'll try
{CHOICE}Too much trouble

{Yuffie}
“So what's the story?”{PAUSE}“Hey {Cloud}.
Give us a quick run down.”
{CHOICE}I'll try
{CHOICE}Too much trouble

{Cloud}
“…I'll try, but don't interrupt
me while I'm explaining.”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth went off searching for the
Promised Land, so he could become the ruler
of the Planet… That was 5 years ago.”

{Cloud}
“Then Sephiroth came back
and killed President Shinra.”

{Cloud}
“And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.”

{Cloud}
“He was carrying Jenova with him.”{PAUSE}“…This much I do know.
He told me he wants to go to the
Promised Land with his mother, Jenova.”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth…
is alive…”{PAUSE}“The Promised Land…
Does it really exist…?”

{Barret}
“Whoa!
We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.”

{Aeris}
“Maybe we shouldn't stay
in here anymore…”

{Red XIII}
“I don't think it's wise
to stay here any longer.”

{Yuffie}
“Phew…
We're finally here…
Now we gotta hide.”
